document.title: DPC-corpus: Dutch Parallel Corpus(non-commercial)
document.intro: The non-commercial version of the Dutch Parallel Corpus is a 10-million-word, high-quality, sentence-aligned parallel corpus for the language pairs Dutch-English and Dutch-French, with Dutch as the central language. A part of the corpus is trilingual. Demo available at http://dpc.inl.nl... Cahiers de l'Institut de Linguistique de Louvain, CILL, Louvain-La-Neuve, 32.1-4, 269-285 Meta, 56 (2), 374-390 DPC contains the language pairs Dutch-English and Dutch-French, with Dutch as the central language. A part of the corpus is trilingual. Sentence alignment. Ten percent of the sentence aligned data was checked manually. For more than 25,000 words of the Dutch-English part of the corpus, manual alignments at the sub-sentential level were created.

access.title: available for non-commercial organisations; user licence required; free demo available at http://dpc.inl.nl/indexd.php
